Package characters

Class Monster

java.lang.Object
java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
characters.Person
characters.Monster
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape, Serializable, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Teleporter
public class Monster extends Person
This class represents a monster that is of person type that can kill a player. A monster walks on its own and acts exactly like a person.
Author:
Jonathan Levi
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • Monster

      public Monster​(processing.core.PImage image, double x, double y, boolean right)
      Constructs a new monster with at a given position either walking right at first or left
      Parameters:
      image - Icon
      x - X-coordinate of top-left corner
      y - Y-coordinate of top-left corner
      right - true if automatic walking starts right
